intro: Fun, fast, and fiercely competitive – perfect for two players on one Nintendo Switch™!
description:
Looking for instant fun with a friend? Whether you're traveling, relaxing at home, or just want a quick challenge, Duo Games delivers a collection of 9 exciting mini-games designed for 2 players on a single console.


Test your reflexes, timing, and strategy in a variety of head-to-head challenges:
- Knives – Aim true and hit the target with perfect precision.
- Hockey – Score goals and defend your net in a fast-paced match.
- Volleyball – Bounce the ball onto your opponent’s side to win.
- Ships – Reflect enemy shots and turn their attacks against them.
- Sushi – Collect sashimi faster than your opponent!
- Sumo – Push your rival out of the ring by mashing the button.
- Spinners – Clash spinners and knock your foe off the arena.
- Pizza – React fast to grab the final slice!
- Bees – Catch pollen quickly and accurately before your opponent does.


With clean, minimalistic visuals and easy-to-learn controls, Duo Games keeps the focus on pure, competitive fun. Great for kids, families, or friends looking for quick matches and big laughs.

Warning: May cause sudden outbursts of laughter and intense rivalries!
